required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Long-term Treatment With SCT800 in Previously Treated Hemophilia A Patients.
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open, Extension Trial to Evaluate Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Human Coagulation Factor VIII (SCT800) During Long Term Treatment in Previously Treated Patients With Severe Haemophilia A .

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multi-center, open-label, extension trial to evaluate the safety, efficacy of SCT800 in long term prophylaxis and on-demand treatment in patients with severe hemophilia A who have been previously treated with coagulation factor VIII(FVIII) . This study includes two phases: the screening period and prophylaxis period.Prophylaxis with 25 - 50 IU/kg of SCT800 shall be administered once every other day or three times per week starting from V1, on-demand treatment is given when bleeding episodes occur. The study period is 120 consecutive weeks.

primary_outcome.description: The Nijmegen-Bethesda assay shall be used to monitor the production of FVIII inhibitors during the trial.

secondary_outcome.description: Annualized Bleeding Rate（ABR） can be calculated using the following formula: Number of bleeding events in efficacy evaluation period/(number of days in treatment period/365.25)
Incremental recovery is determined as the peak factor level recorded in the first hour after infusion and is reported as [IU/ml]/[IU/kg]
The investigator shall evaluate the hemostatic effect after the treatment of every bleeding event of subjects based on a four-point scale(excellent, good, moderate, not relieved).

intervention.description: Participants received SCT800 for prophylaxis and/or on-demand treatment for 120 weeks.

eligibility.gender_description: Hemophilia A is a kind of sex chromosome recessive genetic disease and ofter occurs in male.

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Hematology and Blood Diseases Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences and Peking Union Medical College

facility.name: Institute of Hematology and Blood Diseases Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences and Peking Union Medical College
